attributes.title: DO NOT GET 🤢🤮
attributes.review: I downloaddd the app, hopping to stay informed so that I kan help keep merica gr8, I found a bunch of pictures of 😘my presidents🥰 BUTT! I then saw a massage saying that if I share the ap with my friends I will get a free copy! I canot believe this as I asked my 7 yo son in law to download the app as well! He should not be seeing stuff like this!!!!!! 😭😭😭 I HAVE BEEN DISGUSTED BY THIS APP!!!!! Do not downloading!!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: when i first opened the app, i came face to face with a runaway oompa loompa. i called willy wonka, and he informed me that that THING is our president? 🧚‍♀️absolutely revolted.🧚‍♀️ little (even tho there’s nothing little about mr. i eat mcdonald’s everyday) rat boy and his minions HARASSED me. who’s going to tell them that america was never great? their precious country was built by immigrants, and stolen from native americans. i’m also pretty sure melania trump sent me an encrypted code. dON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!

attributes.title: Did not live up to the hype
attributes.review:
Trolls on twitter told me that trump was the best president of our time, so I downloaded this app. Then I pulled my head out of my ass and realized the greatest president of our time is the man who rescued the country from the Great Recession, cutting the unemployment rate from 10% to 4.7% over six years, passed the $787 billion America Recovery and Reinvestment Act to spur economic growth during the Great Recession, helped put the US on track for energy independence, Won the Nobel Peace Prize in 2009 “for his extraordinary efforts to strengthen international diplomacy and cooperation between peoples,” and supported veterans through a $78 billion tuition assistance GI bill. Who is this kind, patriotic man of substance? Barack Obama. 

trump is a literal Cheeto

attributes.title: I am scared for my life
attributes.review: When I first open the app I was scared for my life I was traumatized it was absolutely atrocious I opened the app and saw the worst sight I have ever seen in my life the app asked me for my personal information and I was so scared that that disgusting man would follow me and haunt me this app needs to be removed immediately if I can save children from having nightmares of that Cheeto dust man with this review and save them from that awful sight I am so glad I can help

attributes.title: very not ca$h money :(
attributes.review: this app gave me irritable bowel syndrome. and multiple infections. i suggest everyone involved in creating the app spend their time on something better, like an app to DO SOME GOOD IN THIS WORLD. anyways daddy Trump should crawl back into his hole and never resurface :) then maybe racist homophobes who watch fox and compare the murder of black people to the economy will follow him and the world will finally have a chance at justice and peace. overall: i hate it here✨😌🧚🏻🌼💞icky cheeto lookin ass🧚🏻✨❣️
